name: Game Species Biomass (% Change)
functionStatement: Habitat and water quality enable reproduction, juvenile growth, survival, and movement of key taxa.
descriptionMarkdown: Population abundance/biomass indicator reflecting recruitment and survival of target game/native species.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Estimate density/biomass (or % change from baseline) per SQT method and score using the appropriate tier/ribbon class thresholds.

inputs.label: Game Species Biomass (% Change)
inputs.helpMarkdown: Fish population surveys and biomass estimation from electrofishing/seining; historical comparison where required.
